scripts.setup: npm run setup:aesthetics && npm run setup:driver && npm run setup:generator && npm run setup:server
scripts.setup:generator: cd generator/scripts/converter && npm i && cd ../../.. && mkdir -p generator/output/scores
scripts.build:services: npm run build:service:aesthetics && npm run build:service:driver && npm run build:service:server
scripts.build:watch: concurrently -p "{name}" -n "AESTHETIC,DRIVER,SERVER" -c "green,green,green,green"-k "npm run build:watch:aesthetics" "npm run build:watch:driver"  "npm run build:watch:server"
